cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 30 miles south of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: continuing northeast just off the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast and then toward Nova Scotia
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Outer Banks / Cape Hatteras area of North Carolina (brush or brief landfall possible)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane and tropical-storm watches confined to the South & North Carolina coasts northward to New England â€“ none in Florida.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from South Santee River SC to NC/VA border; Tropical Storm Warning extends northward to Delaware, Chesapeake Bay and SE New England.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida east coast (large swell and rip currents), Georgia, the Carolinas, Mid-Atlantic and New England coasts.
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty onshore winds and elevated seas/rip currents expected along the southeast Florida coast, but sustained gale or hurricane-force winds unlikely.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected at PortMiami; surge threat confined to the Carolinas northward.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall expected at PortMiami.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents will continue for beach and pilot-boat operations.
